tr.td: Superficial burn of wrist and hand
Superficial burn of wrist and hand

value.displayName: Superficial burn of wrist and hand

translation.displayName: Superficial burn of multiple sites of wrist and hand
Superficial burn of wrist and hand

section.title: Assessments
section.text:
The Patient Mr John was found to have first degree burns and Dr Seven and his staff treated Mr
Wright by cleaning the burn and dressing the burn and observed for couple of hours before
discharging Mr Wright.

section.title: Plan of Treatment
section.text:
i. Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week for Follow up with Outpatient facility.
ii. In Case of high fever, take Tylenol as needed.

section.title: Hospital Discharge Instructions
section.text:
a. Appointments: Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week. Followup with Outpatient
facility.
b. In case of Fever, Take Tylenol as advised in plan of treatment.
